String Handling
[System Configuration]

Collaboration diagram for String Handling:

Detailed Description

These macros define preferred string handling functions in the core library.


Defines

#define _DWFCORE_SWPRINTF
 Always use this macro instead of swprintf for maximum portability. The version of this function overloaded with the count parameter in the MSVCRT does not work correctly.
